replies.body: They don't look like they fit the art style of league D:
[Yeah, I know](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/gsx8OrEd-global-splash-update-incoming) but I personally don't like them.

thanks for the link. I agree - the style of the placeholders doesnt feel "right" to me. Some of them are passable but some of them are just hideous (yes I am looking at you pax / spectacular sivir). 

And gentleman cho? I reckon I could do better with 20 mins, a bottle of ouzo, and some crayons.
Pax Sivir already has an updated splash in PBE. So expect that next patch.

is it this one?

http://www.arcana-gaming.com/content/arcana/upload/League%20of%20Legends/PBE/_Cycle_6.09/2016_04_25/Sivir_Splash_5.jpg




cause this "current" one is ewww....
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/9b/cd/97/9bcd970b111f63987327f9b7e5cfb546.jpg
I reckon I could live with that one.
